aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: I'm a Data Scientist specialized in HR, passionate about leveraging data, technology, and strategic foresight to transform how organizations understand people, performance, and the future of work. As a Ph.D. candidate in Futures Studies, I analyze how tech trends shape labor and talent ecosystems. With 4+ years of hands-on experience in HR analytics, digital transformation, and agile project tools like Jira, I bring both technical depth and business acumen. Open to global opportunities in Europe, North America, or other innovation-driven regions.
